resources.string: A dedicated and detail-oriented Software Engineer at Microsoft, focused on building efficient, scalable, and user-centric software solutions with a strong commitment to continuous learning and clean development practices.

A Java-based Food Donation Application designed to connect donors, NGOs, and volunteers through a streamlined digital platform. The system enables users to register, list surplus food, track real-time availability, and manage pickup or delivery requests. Built using Java, XML-based UI layouts, and Firebase/SQL for backend storage, the application focuses on reducing food waste while improving last-mile distribution efficiency. Core features include donor authentication, geolocation-based NGO matching, request scheduling, and an admin panel for monitoring donation activities. The project emphasizes clean architecture, modular design, and robust data handling to ensure reliability and scalability in real-world use.
B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
